tool.name: Venn Diagram
tool.description: generates Venn diagram of intersections across a series of sets (e.g., intersections of significant genes across tested contrasts). This Venn diagram is available for up to five sets; Intersection plo
tool.command: echo 'galaxy_params.json' && cat 'galaxy_params.json' && echo '' && python '$__tool_directory__/format_values.py' 'galaxy_params.json' 'cleaned_params.json' --bool-values venn_force_unique display_empty_intersections save_plots --list-values select_contrasts intersection_ids venn_category_names_distance venn_category_names_position && echo 'cleaned_params.json' && cat 'cleaned_params.json' && echo '' && mosuite plot_venn_diagram --json=cleaned_params.json

param.name: moo_input_rds
param.label: MOO input Rds
param.help: File path to read the input multiOmicDataSet object (MOO)

param.name: moo_output_rds
param.label: Plot output Rds
param.help: File path to output the plot object as an Rds file

param.name: value
param.label: Value
param.help: A vector of contrast names to select for the plot. If empty, all contrasts are used.

param.name: plot_type
param.label: Select Plot Type
param.help: Type of plot to generate: "Venn diagram" or "Intersection plot". Default: "Venn diagram"

param.name: value
param.label: Value
param.help: A vector of intersection IDs to select for the plot. If empty, all intersections are used.

param.name: venn_force_unique
param.label: Venn Force Unique
param.help: If TRUE, forces unique elements in the Venn diagram. Default: TRUE

param.name: venn_numbers_format
param.label: Venn Numbers Format
param.help: Format for the numbers in the Venn diagram. Options: "raw", "percent", "raw-percent", "percent-raw". Default: "raw"

param.name: venn_significant_digits
param.label: Venn Significant Digits
param.help: Number of significant digits for the Venn diagram numbers. Default: 2

param.name: venn_fill_colors
param.label: Venn Fill Colors
param.help: A vector of colors to fill the Venn diagram categories. Default: c("darkgoldenrod2", "darkolivegreen2", "mediumpurple3", "darkorange2", "lightgreen")

param.name: venn_fill_transparency
param.label: Venn Fill Transparency
param.help: Transparency level for the Venn diagram fill colors. Default: 0.2

param.name: venn_border_colors
param.label: Venn Border Colors
param.help: Colors for the borders of the Venn diagram categories. Default: "fill colors" (uses the same colors as `venn_fill_colors`)

param.name: venn_font_size_for_category_names
param.label: Venn Font Size for Category Names
param.help: Font size for the category names in the Venn diagram. Default: 3

param.name: value
param.label: Value
param.help: Distance of the category names from the Venn diagram circles. Default: c()

param.name: value
param.label: Value
param.help: Position of the category names in the Venn diagram. Default: c()

param.name: venn_font_size_for_counts
param.label: Venn Font Size for Counts
param.help: Font size for the counts in the Venn diagram. Default: 6

param.name: venn_outer_margin
param.label: Venn Outer Margin
param.help: Outer margin for the Venn diagram. Default: 0

param.name: intersections_order
param.label: Intersections Order
param.help: Order of the intersections in the plot. Default: "by size"

param.name: display_empty_intersections
param.label: Display Empty Intersections
param.help: If TRUE, displays empty intersections in the plot. Default: FALSE

param.name: intersection_bar_color
param.label: Intersection Bar Color
param.help: Color for the intersection bars in the plot. Default: "lightgray"

param.name: intersection_line_width
param.label: Intersection Line Width
param.help: Width of the lines in the intersection plot. Default: 0.5

param.name: intersection_point_size
param.label: Intersection Point Size
param.help: Size of the points in the intersection plot. Default: 2

param.name: table_font_size
param.label: Table Font Size
param.help: Font size for the table in the plot. Default: 3

param.name: table_content
param.label: Table Content
param.help: Content of the table in the plot. Default: NULL

param.name: dpi
param.label: Image Resolution
param.help: dots-per-inch of the output image (see `ggsave()`) - only used if save_plots is TRUE

param.name: image_height
param.label: Image Height
param.help: output image height in pixels - only used if save_plots is TRUE

param.name: image_width
param.label: Image Width
param.help: output image width in pixels - only used if save_plots is TRUE

param.name: save_plots
param.label: Save Plots
param.help: Whether to save plots to files during analysis (Defaults to `TRUE`, overwritable using option 'moo_save_plots' or environment variable 'MOO_SAVE_PLOTS')

param.name: feature_id_colname
param.label: Elements Column
param.help: The column from the counts data containing the Feature IDs (Usually Gene or Protein ID). This is usually the first column of your input Counts Matrix. Only columns of Text type from your input Counts Matrix will be available to select for this parameter. (Default: `NULL` - first column in the counts matrix will be used.)

param.name: contrasts_colname
param.label: Categories Column
param.help: Name of the column in `moo_diff_summary_dat` that contains the contrast names (default: "Contrast")

tool.help:
**Venn Diagram**
Runs [MOSuite::plot_venn_diagram()](https://ccbr.github.io/MOSuite/reference/plot_venn_diagram.html)
generates Venn diagram of intersections across a series of sets (e.g., intersections of significant genes across tested contrasts). This Venn diagram is available for up to five sets; Intersection plot is available for any number of sets. Specific sets can be selected for the visualizations and the returned dataset may include all (default) or specified intersections.
**Outputs:**
- multiOmicDataSet: file (plot.rds) - figures: file (figures/diff/venn_diagram.png)
**Version info**
- Docker: nciccbr/mosuite:v0.2.1 - GitHub: [CCBR/MOSuite-Galaxy@36aa29b](https://github.com/CCBR/MOSuite-Galaxy/tree/36aa29b)
